Text:
True to your word.  A gentleman a scholar, and 
a fine judge of fiction.  thanks.......
I don't know if you take requests or not but is there any way you can post Wonderland by Ace Atkins, It was released the same day as Silken Prey. Thank You for your time.

@seminoles85 kind of what I explained earlier with the Spenser books in general. There are A LOT of them and I know it's a well liked series and that people have also warmed up to Ace Atkins to keep it going. It's going to take some SERIOUS work on my part and I have to set priorities. But I can do a single book no matter what.
